inn1.comm: bang on target first up and Tamim does well to get right behind the line to defend
he oversteps, he strays wide of the offstump and he cuts to point

Dropped: Irresponsible shot there, he makes room to a full delivery and tries to carve it over the off side, he gets a thick outside edge which flies to Tharanga at first slip, he gets a hand to it but his reflexes aren't sharp enough, the ball runs away for four
gets a good stride forward and defends it solidly
another chance! He gets a stride forward and the thin outside edge just falls short of Sangakkara, it didn't carry
gets his front pad across and the inside edge rolls to the on side
lunges forward early and defends a good length ball back to the bowler
nice delivery to begin with, he bangs it in back of a length and has Junaid fishing outside off
back of a length again, hits the deck hard and gets it to climb on Junaid who meets the ball high on the pad
sticks to the same length and Junaid turns the face of the bat and clips it to square leg, Maharoof doesn't time his slide well
very dangerous leave there, the ball cuts back in sharply off the seam and nearly shaves the offstump
wide and angling further away frm the offstump, he reaches out and slashes it down to third man
continues over the wicket, lands outside off and he shoulders arms
moves away from the left-hander off the pitch and he gets across his stumps and slashes it down to third man

this time Sangakkara hangs on and shows brilliant reflexes, Junaid pokes forward at a delivery which shapes away from him and gets a thick outside edge, Sangakkara flings himself to his left and takes it one-handed in front of first slip, one for the album
lands it outside off and he decides to shoulders arms
once again drags it wide outside off and Mushfiqur isn't interested in chasing that
gets the angle closer to the offstump and he gets across and shoulders arms
bowls a slightly fuller length, he watchfully shoulders arms
gets a bit of width to crack it through the off side but he succeeds in getting a thick inside edge to the keeper
bit if width again and he cuts to backward point
lands just a shade outside off and comes back in, it clips his pads just outside the line of the legstump
keeps low and skids through very sharply, he just about manages to defend it
comes back in off a good length and he clips it to the on side
lovely shot, he overpitches outside the offstump, he gets nicely behind the line and drives on the front foot between mid-off and cover
holds the length back and gets the ball to nip back in sharply, he clips it with the movement to square leg
keeps it on the offstump and he pushes it to the off side
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
and Mushfiqur's miserable tri-series continues, he prods forward to defend but the ball comes back in from outside off, he manages a thick inside edge which cannons on to his off and middle stumps
gets forward and tucks it towards mid-on
hits a good length outside off, he defends with soft hands and tells his partner to hang on
this one really kicks up on him and he can't resist a wild swing outside off, not the best shot in this scenario
much better, the delivery is angled across him and he safely shoulders arms
angles it on the pads and he tucks it just wide of square leg
that's a cracker of a shot, he pitches it up full and wide of the offstump, Tamim gets on his knee and executes a cover drive to die for, he's a treat to watch when he gets going
nice comeback by Thushara as he gets this one to jag back in sharply, he shoulders arms very close to the off stump
gets this one to jag back in and clip his pad as he to clip it to the on side, not a bad shout for leg before
angles it on the body and he shuffles and works it down to fine leg
gets his front pad across and watchfully shoulders arms
lands it just outside off and angles away from the left-hander before reaching the keeper
that's a jaffa, he pitches it on the legstump and gets it to move away sharply off the seam, poor Tamim was completely squared up
gets across his stumps and covers the line properly this time as he defends
not the best start for Maharoof, he overpitches it outside off and gives Ashraful room, he bends his knee and places it easily in the gap between mid-off and cover
gets nicely behind the line and defends
pokes forward to a delivery which moves away and he opens the face of the bat and angles it just wide of slip
gets it to land outside off and he shoulders arms
shapes to punch it through the off side but he mistimes the shot and chops it down to cover
lands it outside off and the ball goes through low to the keeper
pushes it towards cover with soft hands and thinks of a single
commits to the front foot and pushes it in front of mid-on this time and once again tells his partner to hold fire
bangs it in short and it's a bouncer which sails over ashraful, the umpire calls it a wide
gets it to an angle in sharply through the air and he chips it on the up towards cover
goes on the walk and taps it away softly to mid-off
gets a half stride forward and gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
lands it outside the offstump, he prods forward, opens the face of the bat and glides it away towards slip
he pitches it too short and wide outside off, he rides the bounce and carves it over cover, looked a little risky at first but he was well in control of it
fuller in length, he pushes it to the off side
lands it on a full length outside off and he shoulders arms
sticks to the same full length outside off and Tamim exercises caution again
tempts him to go for a very flashy off drive and Tamim nearly falls for the bait
cuts back in off a good length, he gets behind the line and defends
thrusts forward to a delivery which shapes back in and he defends forward
comes back in with the angle, he gets forward, turns the face of the bat and clips it to square leg
gets a bit of inward movement and he pushes it through the line to midwicket
tries to fire in a yorker on the stumps and Tamim does well to dig it out
comes round the wicket this time, pitches it outside off and gets it to move away off the pitch, he shoulders arms
the length is a little too short for this pitch, Ashraful gives him the charge, makes use of the width and carves it over backward point
bowls it fuller and draws the batsman forward
bowls the legcutter this time and Ashraful is squared up outside the offstump
gets behind the line to a good length ball and taps it to the off side

Maharoof gets his reward after squaring up the batsman just a couple of balls before, he pitches it on a good length and gets it to shape away from the offstump, Ashraful hangs his bat out to steer it away but only succeeds it getting a thick edge to Sangakkara
gets his front pad across and defends to the on side
shoulders arms outside the offstump
gets it to angle across him sharply again and he prods forward and is beaten
comes round the wicket, pitches outside off and moves away after pitching
lands it outside off and the ball holds its line this time before reaching the keeper
drives on the front foot back to the bowler, he gets his right hand out to intercept it
shoulders arms outside off
comes over the wicket, he lands it outside off and he defends back to the bowler
brilliant shot, Maharoof errs by giving him width outside off and he drags it too short, he rocks back, gets his elbows high and cuts it hard past the arc between backward point and cover
back of a length, he defends back to the bowler
beats him on the forward prod, he gets a bit of lift on that delivery
taps it with soft hands and Tamim thinks of single but darts back to his crease on seeing the bowler sprint across and pick it up
shoulders arms outside off

not the most convincing of boundaries, he charges down the track to presumably swing him across the line to the on side but he miscues it over mid-off, the fielder dives in despair before the rope, strange shot

Tamim tries to repeat the shot off the previous ball and pays the penalty, he makes room, gives him the charge and tries to mow him over the on side but the ball clips the toe edge of the bat and Sangakkara takes his second brilliant catch of the morning, he flings to his left and takes it one handed in front of slip
gets forward to an incoming delivery and pushes it in front of mid-on
angles across him and he defends back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, he covers the late away movement and defends it away
comes in to the left-hander this time and he clips it to the on side
tries to shoulder arms and the ball nips back in sharply, he shows the periscope and the ball hits his elbow and rolls to slip
gets it to lift off a good length and Raqibul does well to offer no shot
comes back in from just a shade outside off and he gets his bat nicely behind the line to defend
loses his radar and strays down the leg side
angles it wide outside the off stump and he gets behind and pushes it to the off side
lands it on a length outside off, he shoulders arms
strays on the body and he shuffles and glance it down to fine leg
lands it on a full length outside off and the ball holds its line, he defends
shapes to drive straight and he takes a chance with Murali stationed at mid-off, the throw was just wide of the stumps, a direct hit and he was gone
flashes hard away from the body and nearly edges it
very streaky, Thushara lands it just a shade outside off and he's cramped for room to cut and the inside edge beats the stumps and the keeper and rolls away for four
shoulders arms outside off this time
shuffles and clips it towards midwicket
the extra bounce tucks him up and he uneasily fends it off to square leg
lands it on a full length outside off and he shoulders arms
bowls a good length outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
loses his direction and strays wide outside off
angles it wide of the offstump again and another wide called
much better, adjusts the line closer to the off stump and he shoulders arms
gets it to nip back in and  he tucks it to the on side
goes for a very flashy  drive through he covers off the backfoot and misses it completely, very poor shot from a man in form
angles it on the body and he waits for the ball to come onto him before glancing it fine
lands it on a good length outside off and he defends
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man

and Bangladesh slide further, Thushara gets it to curve in through the air, Shakib shapes to slash it square of the wicket and plays away from the body, he gets a thick edge to Sangakkara, he tried the same shot a couple of balls earlier
gets a half stride forward and defends
angles it on the pads and he clips it away to fine leg, who's fielding square
gives him width outside off and he slashes it away to third man
nearly gets his man, he gets it to nip back in and rear up alarmingly, he hops at the crease and fends it off his gloves and Jayasuriya falls forward at leg slip and nearly takes the catch
open the face of the bat and angles it to third man
gets a half stride forward and pushes it to the off side
gets it to nip back in and he defends to the on side
thrusts his pad across and shoulders arms
gets across to a good length ball and defends
bowls it a fraction shorter and the ball fizzes past his helmet
gets across and shoulders arms
same result, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
opens the face of the bat and steers it away towards backward point, that's a maiden
lands it on a good length outside off and he pushes it softly to the covers
angles across him and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
breaks the shackles, Maharoof bangs it in short and Mahmudullah decides to take him on by swiveling and hooking with power over long leg
good comeback by Maharoof as he gets one to kick up and the batsman fends it away well by dropping his bat
bowls a leg cutter and he pushes it away with soft hands to mid-off
gets forward to a full ball and defends to the off side
gets across his stumps and taps it down to point
poor ball and dispatched well, he strays on the pads and he shuffles and chips it high off the pads over midwicket and square leg
drags it from outside the offstump and he pulls on one leg to Jayasuriya at deep midwicket
lands outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
gets well forward to a full ball and defends back to the bowler
gets well forward to a full ball and works it away wide of midwicket
comes through straight, he taps it back to the bowler
shuffles and knocks it to leg gully
gets his pad forward and chips it in the air towards short midwicket
thrusts forward and defends close to the pad
comes on slower, he commits to the front foot and defends
full on middle and leg and defends
comes round the wicket and he strays wide down the leg side
gets forward and taps it just wide of the bowler
picks the doosra early and dabs it away very late past backward point
gets forward and a leading edge luckily falls safe of cover
quicker through the air, he gets forward and tucks it with the turn to the on side
strays on the pads, he closes the face of the bat and softly glances it past short fine leg, well placed
angles it outside off and he taps it to the off side
full on middle and off and defended on the front foot
thrusts forward and defends
gets well forward and defends on the front foot
thrusts forward again and defends
full on the pads and he works it away behind square on the on side
slower through the air, he lunges forward and steers it to the vacant point region for a single
pushes it quicker, the outside edge just beats Mahela at slip
quick again, he gets well forward and defends
continues round the wicket, he gets well forward and smothers the spin
a little slower, he angles it to backward point and pushes for the second run but he's sent back
full on middle and leg and worked to the on side
turns the face of the bat and works it with the turn to midwicket
full on the pads and pushed to the on side
defended back to the bowler
floated on the pads and worked towards mid-on
pushed on the pads and clipped to the on side
full on the pads and worked towards midwicket
takes a quick single to short cover, Mathews tries an under arm flick on the dive
continues round the wicket, he defends forward
defends on the front foot again
not much turn and he defends on the front foot
comes through slow and straight and he defends softly
angles it on the pads and he works it away softly towards short fine leg
full on the pads and pushed through the line to long-on
lands it just wide outside off and he makes room and cuts to deep point
slow through the air and comes on straight, he defends
gets well forward and smothers the spin again
rank long hop and he pulls off the front foot but he cant bisect the gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg
defends on the front foot
gets well forward and smothers the spin
commits to the front foot and defends
slower through the air, no turn again and he defends
gets his front foot across and softly taps t to the on side
slower through the air and defended to the off side
takes a couple of paces forward and works it with the angle  to long-on
slower through the air, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to backward point
fires it outside off, he fails to dig out the yorker
skids through and comes in to him, he defends to the off side
slower through the air and he defends forward
comes in to him with the angle and he works it to the onside
gives him width outside off and he cuts
similar delivery, he cuts to sweeper cover
gets well forward and defends
just strays down the leg side and he fails to glance it away
fires it flat and quick from round the wicket and the ball really skid through, he's cramped for room to defend it away and a thick inside edge rolls on to the stumps
thrusts his pad forward and shoulders arms
nudges it away towards short fine leg
comes through straight from outside off and he defends
continues round the wicket, he softly nudges it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he defends forward
slower through the air, he defends forward
slow through the air again and he defends
defends on the front foot
no variation, same shot
and once again softly tapped back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, he gets well forward and defends
thrusts forward and pushes it towards mid-on
gets a few paces down the pitch and checks his shot
nudged towards short square leg and the fielder darts across and fires the throw to the keeper who whips off the bails, he was home
left alone to the keeper
gets on the front foot and punches it firmly and just beats shorrt cover
knocks it back to the bowler
pushed to the on side
makes a bit of room and he steers it to the off side
pushed back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler
shuffles and works it with the turn to square leg
gets well forward and pushes it towards cover
taps it in front of short cover with soft hands and sets off
fires it quicker and slides down the leg side, wide called
the ball skids through and beats the off stump and squirts between Sangakkara's legs
strays on the pads and he clips it away wide of short fine-leg who slides and cuts it off
attempts the paddle scoop and he clears the keeper
thrusts his pad forward and he's beaten
floated on the pads and he pushes it towards mid-on
slower through the air, he defends back to the bowler
lands it on a full length on the pads, he pushes it to long-on
defended back to the bowler
exposes his stumps and goes back, the ball spins on to him and he steers it to the off side
full on the pads and nudged to short fine leg
quicker through the air, he gets well forward and defends
stays on the backfoot and cuts to the off side
full on the off stump and searches for a single to mid-off
drives on the front foot just wide of mid-off and he takes the single this time
floated on the pads, he works it away to square leg
thrusts forward and steers it to the off side
full outside off and he defends back to the bowler
steers it to the off side
tries to steer it away very close to the body and he nearly feathers an edge
shoots through low, he shuffles, waits for the turn and clips it to mid-on
floated on the pads, he works it to the on side
slower through the air and defended back to the bowler
slow through the air again and defended back to the bowler
gets forward and taps it to the on side
gets on the front foot and taps it to the on side
defended back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and punches it to long-on
pushes it with sot hands wide of backward point and sets off
thrusts forward and works it to the off side
pushes it towards cover and sets off, Mubarak has a shy at the stumps on the dive
pushes it t the off side for a single
gets well forward and defends
super shot, Mendis drops it a fraction too short outside off, he rocks back and cuts hard between backward point and cover
gets well forward and places it to the off side
pushed back to the bowler
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
drops it a fraction short and he rocks back and cuts to sweeper over
stays back and punches it to long-on
stays back and punches it to shot cover
gets a half stride forward and defends
defends to the off side
thrusts forward and defends back to the bowler
pushed in flat and slow, he turns it to short midwicket
tries to reverse sweep him but misses
strays just wide down the leg side
chips down the track and checks his drive
chips down the track and works it to the on side
opens the face of the bat on seeing the doosra and taps it wide of short third man
tries to reverse sweep him but misses, he strays down the leg side
Dropped He chips down the track and he tries to chip it over the bowler and he gets a leading edge to Thushara at mid-off as he dives forward, gets a hand to it and spills the catch
strays wide down the leg side
beats him with a leg break
pushed in quicker, he defends back to the bowler
gives him the charge and scoops it towards mid-off, no chance for Thushara to catch that
drives on the up again towards mid-off but Thusha is deep
charges down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and crashes it past the bowler and mid-on
nudges it to the on side and there's hesitation in the running, Sangakkara takes aim at the other end but Murali broke the stumps before gathering the ball
tries to paddle scoop him but he fails to clear shirt fine leg
advances down the track, he changes his mind on the stroke and the ball nearly trickles back to the keeper, he could have been stumped
nudged off the pads
tries to slog sweep him but the ball clips his elbow and rolls, too early on the shot
tucked to midwicket
gets on his knee and slogs him away down to deep midwicket

decides to give him the charge but this time he fails to check his stroke and ends up chipping it tamely to mid-off, he didn't get the elevation either, that ends Naeem's stubborn resistance, he dives to his right and takes it neatly
pitches it up on middle and leg, Mortaza helps himself to a slog sweep but he fails to clear deep square leg, it goes down Kapugedera's throat
gets well forward and defends
fires that quicker through the air, he gets down to heave him across the line too early and the ball turns and hits his thigh plumb in front, Enamul Haque gives him out
gets forward and steers it towards short cover
this one straightens and beats Rubel
cuts back in sharply and clips him high on the pad
fires that quicker and he shows the full face of the bat and defends on the front foot
gets well forward and defends
chips down the track and works it to the on side
flights it on middle and off, he slogs him across the line but fails to get the desired elevation, he finds Kapugedera at deep square-leg

inn2.comm: what a start! He taps it softly towards extra cover and there;s plenty of hesitation in the running, Jayasuriya starts then he's sent back and Shakib flings himself to his left, gathers the ball and hits the target, the batsman was nowhere in the picture
lands outside off and he shoulders arms
full outside off and driven very firmly to backward point
hits a good length outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
lands on a good length outside off from over the wicket, it angles across him and beats the outside edge
fires it on a yorker length and he gets his bat down to dig it out
lands it on a length outside off and gets it to shape away, he shoulders arms
delivers it on a good length outside off, he watches it angle away to the keeper
he continues to be watchful outside the offstump,Nazmul gets a nice shape away from the left-hander
and another maiden, Sangakkara doesn't want to chase anything outside the offstump
drives to mid-off and decides against the single, Ashraful hits the stumps at the striker's end and the ball rebounds to the off side
strays quite wide of the offstump, he shoulders arms
lands it on a good length outside off, he gets his pad across and shoulders arms
taps it in front of mid-off and sets off in a flash, extra cover runs across but he dives in vain to cut it off
pitches it up outside off and angles i away from the left-hander, he shoulders arms
fires it outside the offstump and there's really good carry to Mushfiqur who takes it close to his face
lands it on a good length outside off,  he gets behind the line and defends
pitches it on the corridor outside off, he gets his pad across the stumps and shoulders arms
angles it across the left-hander and he remains watchful outside the offstump
full on the pads, he shuffles and works it away to mid-on
lands it on a good length outside off and keeps Sangakkara quiet again as he shoulders arms
tucked towards short midwicket, he has a shy at the stumps
well he pokes at it outside off and nearly feathers an edge, nervous start here for Sri Lanka
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends to mid-off
hits a good length outside off and he taps it away to point
the slower ball is angled towards his pads and he softly nudges it to short midwicket
the ball rises up and comes on a little slow, he pokes his bat out and steers it to third man
short and wide outside off and he cuts to backward point

Tharanga loses his patience and gives it all away, Nazmul sprays it wide outside off and tempts the batsman to have a wild swing at it, he stays rooted to the crease and gets a thick outside edge to the keeper, the crowd has gone wild and why not
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms

Mahela's nightmare continues, Nazmul hits a good length outsiede off and gets it to shape away late, a very circumspect Jaywardene pokes at it very lazily and the outside edge flies to Mushfiqur who flings himself to his right and takes it brilliantly
opens the face of the bat and gets an outside edge to third man
angles it across the left-hander and he shoulders arms
strays a little further away from the offstump, he shoulders arms
fullish in length around the offstump, he gets forward and pushes it to cover

it's 5 for 4 and Mortaza is ecstatic! He pitches it up outside off and gets it to move away, Kapugedera is drawn forward and he ends up tamely edging it to Junaid second slip, Sri Lanka are wobbling and they desperately need some damage control
bangs it in short of a length and the bouncer fizzes past his helmet
a flash and a miss! He gets a bit of width to free his arms and he fails to move his feet
lands it on a good length on the offstump and he opens the face of the bat and taps it to backward point
gets across his stumps and tap it very softly to short extra cover
drives hard on  the front foot and he fails to put a full delivery away and pierce the off side field
cleverly holds the length back and he can't resist another slash, Mushfiqur knew how close that was
lands it on a nice length outside off, he's not interested in chasing that
taps it with soft hands towards mid-off and sends his partner back, the fielder has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end
gets his foot across the stumps and he taps it away to mid-off

he hits the timber and noise across the stadium is deafening,  Nazmul lands it on a good length just a shade outside off, Thushara shapes to push at it but it is a half-hearted shot and he manages a thick inside edge onto his stumps
gets width outside off and he slams it down to square third man
lands it on a good length outside off and he decides to leave it
adjusts to a fuller length on the offstump, he lets it go
gets his front foot across the stumps and clips it to midwicket
just slightly opens the face of the bat and dabs it away late to third man
continues over the wicket, he lands it outside off and Sangakkara watches it through to the keeper
bangs it in on a good length on the offstump and this time Sangakkara gets behind the line and defends
this one shapes across the left-hander and he's content letting it go
the first of the innings, Nazmul gives him width, he gets back and across, frees his arms and finds the gap between backward point and cover
slightly fuller in length and he pushes it away towards mid-off
shuffles across his stumps and clips it away wide of midwicket
continues over the wicket, he lands it on a good length on the off stump and defends
probes very close to the offstump and the batsman shows good judgement in letting it go
Dropped! But a fabulous attempt, the ball kicks up on the left hander and the outside edge flies to Tamim Iqbal at first slip, he leaps up and flings himself to his left to get a finger to it
fires it on a full length and he gets forward and the inside edge rolls to the on side
pitches it up outside off and Sangakkaa leaves it alone
angles it towards his body and he flicks his wrists and places it to midwicket
lands it just outside the offstump and he watchfully shoulders arms
this time he gets across his stumps and taps it away towards mid-on
drops it a fraction too short and he swivels quickly and pulls it away to fine leg, he doesn't time it well
lands it just a shade outside off and catches Sangakkara in two minds, he gets a long way across his stumps and shoulders arms
shoulders arms again, this time to a slower ball, he's still very circumspect
this time he gets some wood on it as he gets across his stumps and defends to mid-off
gets on the backfoot and taps it in front of Ashraful at mid-off and sets off quickly, he fails to gather the ball in time
Chance! Pitches it up outside off and the outside edge travels low to Junaid at first slip, he fails to cup is hands under the ball
steers it away wide of point and a nice effort in the field restricts that to a single
gets across his stumps to cover the line and defends
the ball keeps a little low outside off and he shoulders arms, the keeper underarms it towards the stumps
gets it to come back in and Sangakkara gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
nice counter-attacking shot, Nazmul overpitches outside the offstump, he gets behind the line and spanks it uppishly just wide of mid-off, seemed a little risky at first
strays wide of the offstump, close to being called a wide
angles it across the left-hander and he lets this one go as well
finds his rhythm here, Nazmul errrs by dropping it too short, the bounce is good enough for the tall Mubarak to rock back and across and pull over midwicket
attempts a short arm pull but he mistimes it to midwicket
gets a little bit of width to cut but he mistimes the shot to cover
goes back and across and taps it back down the pitch and Mortaza flings hiimself to his right and cuts it off
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
gets his front pad across and taps it towards mid-on
gets across his stumps and taps it softly back to the bowler
bowls a nice sharp line on the offstump and he defends on the backfoot
he rocks back and across at his crease and punches a skiddy delivery down to cover, the fielder gets across quickly to cut it off and has a shy at the stumps on seeing the batsmen scamper through
gets back and across and taps it back to the bowler
angled on middle and leg and he turns it away towards square leg, decides against the single
full on the pads and worked away to deep square leg
drops it a fraction too short outside off and he rocks back and cuts wide of cover
quicker through the air and he defends to the on side
chips down the track but checks his stroke and pushes it back to the bowler, he thinks of flinging the ball back at the stumps
pitches just a shade outside leg and traps him on the pads, Rubel appeals and Doctrove shakes his head
full on the pads and he works it to midwicket
clips towards midwicket and there's a shy at the stumps
clips it towards square leg and he decides against the single
taps it towards mid-on and sets off, the throw hits the stumps at the bowler's end and there's an overthrow after the deflection
full on middle and off, he pushes it down to midwicket
bangs it in short of a length down the leg side and the ball glances off his body and just beats Mushfiqur's glove
bangs it in on a good length on the offstump and he gets behind the line and defends
same line and length and he defends to the off side
exerts himself on the delivery stride, lands it on middle and Sangakkara closes the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket
thuds the bouncer and Sangakkara bends down straight and evades it
good length outside the offstump and pushed down to mid-off
defends close to his pads
commits to the drive early and plays it with the spin to sweeper cover
angles it towards middle and he lunges forward to defend
gets across and clips it away to deep square-leg
was that a chance Mubarak tries to dab it away very close to the body and there appeared to be a noise, the ball hurries on to Mushfiqur who takes the catch
classic shot, Rubel gives him width outside off and he gets well across and crashes it on the front foot and bisects the covers
he's careful outside the off stump,he lets it go
pushes it back down the pitch, Rubel Hossain dives to intercept it
gets right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
another cracker of a boundary, he fires it a fraction too short outside off and Sangakkara gets his elbows high up and cracks it past the diving backward point fielder
gets behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it towards cover
Chance! He gives him the charge and the ball just dips in front of Nazmul who dives forward
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
defends firmly on the front foot
angles it on middle and leg, he pushes it to midwicket
bangs it in short on the body and he pulls with control along the turf to fine leg

suicidal single and Mubarak pays the price, he taps it with soft hands to mid-off and sets off for a very risky run, Naeem Islam gathers the ball and finds Mubarak  well short of his ground with a direct hit
gets behind the line and softly taps it to mid-off
short and wide and he gets the punishment, he rocks back, gets the elbows high and slaps it past backward point, Rubel needs to vary his length
short and wide again and this time sweeper cover mops up
he expectedly bangs it in short and Maharoof just manages to duck and take evasive action
puts away a low full toss to long-on
full on middle and tapped to the on side
defended on the front foot
gets forward and drives to short cover
fails to blast a full toss and only manages to push it past the bowler
angled on middle and leg, he pushes it to the on side
bangs it in short and the ball doesn't come on very quickly, he taps it towards midwicket
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends to the off side
gets a bit of width outside off and he punches it wide of the covers
uses his feet and works it away firmly to mid-on
attempts an inswinging yorker ad he slides at the crease and whips it away wide of midwicket, well played
full on the pads and works it to the off side
gets well forward and steers it wide of point
slides on middle and leg, he shuffles and clips it to short fine leg
lovely shot, he gives him the charge and lofts him swiftly through the line, the follow through was perfect, the ball sails over long-off
gets forward and defends
full and wide outside off, he gets well forward and just scoops it over backward point
hits a full length outside off and he watchfully shoulders arms
taps it just wide of cover with soft hands and sets off quickly
defends to the off side
gets back and defends back to the bowler
gets a half stride forward and defends to the covers
drives down the ground and hits the stumps
flighted on middle and leg, he defends forward
defends on the front foot
delivers from wide of the crease and Sanga slashes outside off and misses
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
gets well forward and defends
flighted outside off and defended back to the bowler
lunges forward and defends to the off side
angles it on the pads and he works it to midwicket
defends back to the bowler
opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
rocks back and he places it straight to midwicket
prods forward and the ball just beats the outside edge
rocks back at his crease and punches it through the line to long-on
angles it on middle and leg and he works it with the turn to square leg
uses his feet, he checks his stroke and the ball trickles off his pads
gives him room and he cuts to Raqibul at point, Bangladesh are attacking here
Naeem tries to intercept a drive, mid-off picks it up and fires it to the keeper
full on the pads and worked away to deep midwicket
gets across his stumps and works it away to deep midwicket
luck y escape there as an inside edge just trickles past the stumps
nudged to the on side
he checks his shot and nearly chips it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and tucks it away to the on side
shuffles at the crease and works it to short fine leg
shuffles and works it to the on side
take that! He flights it on the offstump and he gets on his knee and slog sweeps it over deep midwicket
stays on the backfoot and chips it on the down to long-on
stays back and defends
makes room and cuts with the turn to the off side
fires a full delivery outside off and he dig it out to sweeper cover
stays on the backfoot and defends
shuffles at the crease and works it to the on side
commits to the front foot and drives back to the bowler
the ball straightens after pitching and he rocks back and cuts
gets well forward and drives on the up to mid-off
defended to the on side
Mortaza runs in for a new spell, he lands it on a full length and he drives to mid-off
a little too short outside off but he cuts hard and straight to Raqibul at backward point
mistimes another square cut straight to Raqibul
bowls the slower ball on the pads and he forces it past the bowler and places it to mid-on
lands it on a good length on off and middle and he defends to mid-on
gets forward to defend but the bat comes down a little late and the inside edge rolls to fine leg
full outside off and spanked straight to short cover
strays on the pads but he follows the movement and whips it away with ease wide of the vacant square leg region
shapes to drive straight but the ball clips the bottom edge and beats second slip
lands it outside off and he exercises caution by shouldering arms
strays on the pads and he shuffles and works it to mid-on
he errs by dropping it too full on the pads, he shuffles across his stumps slightly and works it with ease past mid-on, he didn't even bother to run
fullish in length on middle and off and he defends back to the bowler
gets a bit of extra lift and the ball brushes his thigh before rolling to the off side
tries to unsettle him by taking a few paces down the pitch and he checks his shot and steers it wide of the diving backward point fielder
a little short but not wide enough to free his arms, he chops it down to backward point
lands it on a good length outside off, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
keeps with the same line and length and Sangakkara is content letting it go
full outside off and dug out to backward point, the fielder has a shy at the stumps on seeing Sangakkara out of his crease
gives him width outside off and he reaches out and slices it down to sweeper cover
gets behind the line and defends
full outside the offstump and he shapes to drive straight but he gets an inside edge to the on side
gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he rocks back and cuts to point
flighted on the pads and he clips it down to square leg
floated on middle and leg, he works it to midwicket
stays on the backfoot and punches it back to the bowler
commits to the front foot and defends
tries to work it with the turn and luckily he check his stroke and the ball falls short of midwicket
full outside off and driven to mid-off
gives him width outside off, he reaches out and chops it down to point
gives him width and he chops it down to sweeper cover, he reaches an exemplary half-century under pressure
bowls the slower ball a little wide down the leg side, he swings and mjsses, Enamul Haque is leniant and doesn't call it a wide
bowls it on middle and leg, he drives to the on side
stays on the backfoot and punches it down to long-on, Sri Lanka cross a psychological barrier
floats it on the pads and he works it to the on side
gets on his knee and slogs him over midwicket
tries to fetch it from outside off and sweep against the spin, he misses
gets forward and defends
flighted on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
full outside off and he drives wide of cover
angles it towards middle and leg, he shuffles and clips it away close to the pads down to deep square-leg
lands it on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends
shapes to drive a delivery which shapes away from him and he gets a thick outside edge which sails past the vacant slip region
strays on the body and he shuffles and clips it away down to fine leg, they scamper through for the second but the throw is  a little weak
defends to the off side
stays on the backfoot and defends
big appeal! Comes round the wicket, he traps him on the pad on the forward prod, the ball holds its line, that was very close
works it to the on side
takes a few paces down the track and chips it with control over midwicket, he picks his spot and bisects the gap on the on side
defends to the off side
he waits for the turn and cuts square of the wicket on the off side
it's THAT man Shakib again! Sangakkara shapes to work him through the on side but plays too early, the leading edge nearly clears the bowler but Shakib leaps up and takes it with his right hand
gets well forward and defends
that's a double strike! Shakib lands it just outside off and Kulasekara shapes to cut, he plays a loose drive without moving his feet and the inside edge trickles on to the stumps
flights it on middle and leg, he defends
he plays another defensive shot, he isn't his usual cheerful self, what a scenario to walk into
stays back and angles it to point, the decibel levels have shot up
fires it full on ,middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
taps it softly to the off side and they squeeze a single
chips it on the up past the bowler and down to mid-on
shuffles and works it away past Mashrafe at short fine leg and a misfield allows a precious run
punches it through the off side and Ashraful shows good commitment at mid-off to slide and cut it off
well well Murali has some fun, he makes room on seeing a rank log hop and biffs it across the line, there's nobody close to cow corner to cut it off
he isn't finished yet, he over pitches on middle and leg, ha makes room and scoops it over mid-on, the fielder tries to pull it back but the ball beats him
makes room and drives him past mid-off this time, Ashraful does brilliantly to pull it back before the rope
oh well! He stays at the crease this time and swings him across the line and beats fine leg, a stunning passage of play here!
fires it on a full length outside off and he nearly feathers an edge to the keeper
this is pulsating stuff! Rubal overpitches on middle and leg, he makes room, gets under it and lofts him for a straight six
flighted on middle and leg and defended
gets well forward and defends again, he's patient here
strays on the pads and he clips it away wide of short fine leg
gets forward and works it to the on side
thrusts his pad forward and taps it to the off side
makes room to cut but the ball skids through, he chops it down to the covers
bangs in the bouncer, he makes room and tries an upper cut but there isn;t any signal by the umpires, Murali gestures in surprise
he makes room again and biffs a short ball from outside off, the ball is in the air for a few anxious moments before dropping short of midwicket
makes room and Rubel follows him. he swings and misses and Rahim does brilliantly to fling himself to his left and save a boundary
strays on the body and he shuffles and clips it to the on side
Murali never ceases to amaze! He makes room to an overpitched ball and he clubs it high over deep midwicket! Good Lord that sailed into the crowd
and the scores are level! He makes room to a short ball and swings, the top edge sails over a hapless Rahim and runs away fir four
it's all over, he makes a bit of room and swipes it across the line and bets midwicket, Maharoof can't hide his delight and Murali gives him a bear hug, Shakib squats in disappointment
